GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
staging: r8188eu: prevent ->Ssid overflow in rtw_wx_set_scan()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit c4bd6b72df4f01aa866ceb298466d6d07a6bd525, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 2b42bd58b32155a1be4dd78991845dec05aaef9e. For more details please see the references link.
